p: Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium (DMEM) pH = 7.2 to which 10% FBS was supplemented was used to culture breast cancer MCF-7 cells. The media were also added with gentamicin (100 U/mL) to prevent any cross contamination. A humidified incubator with 5% CO 2 was used to incubate cells. The cell population (80−90%) was harvested using trypsin then washed in PBS and used for further experiments.
